elevator

    • Constructor Detail

      • Elevator

        public Elevator()
        Creates Elevator object from numberOfCustomers and numOfFloors taken from Building class. Repeatedly moves up and down Building to pick up and drop off customers to requested floors. Calls on pickUpCustomer(), dropOffCustomer() and move() methods in order to do this. Keeps record of floors visited and customers served. Once all customers have been served the program prints total number of moves made and customers served. Then exits the program.

    • Method Detail

      • pickUpCustomer

        public static void pickUpCustomer()
        Moves the elevator to the start floor the customer is waiting at. Calls upon the move() method. direction is used to decide direction elevator is to move in.

      • dropOffCustomer

        public static void dropOffCustomer()
        Moves elevator with customer in to the destination floor Calls upon the move() method. direction is used to decide direction elevator is to move in.

      • move

        public static void move()
        Uses variable direction to move the elevator up or down one floor. keeps record of moves made and updates the currentFloor after each call of method.

      • getCurrentFloor

        public static int getCurrentFloor()
        Returns the current floor the elevator is at.
        Returns:
        int currentFloor

      • setCurrentFloor

        public static void setCurrentFloor(int num)
        Sets the current floor in the elevator
        Parameters:
        num - assigned to currentFloor

      • getDirection

        public static java.lang.String getDirection()
        Returns the direction the elevator is traveling in.
        Returns:
        String direction

      • setDirection

        public static void setDirection(java.lang.String s)
        Sets the direction the elevator should travel in
        Parameters:
        s - assigned to direction
